A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The franchise had been disneyfied\, and it feels like there was an executive with a checklist over the director's shoulder in every scene. 
"According to our research team there\, you gotta add some cute critters\, at least one more light saber fight and some spiritual shit scene". 

All the life was sucked from it\, and there nothing but an empty shell left. What a shame.
